titleStmt.title: A testimony concerning George Russel who dyed a prisoner upon truth's account for bearing his testimouy [sic] against tythes.
titleStmt.author: Ford, Robert, of Devonshire.
Batt, Jasper, d. 1702. aut

notesStmt.note: "The testimony of Jasper Batt for George Russel" has caption title; register and pagination are continuous.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
